Package com.company

Class Color

java.lang.Object
com.company.Color
public class Color extends Object
Color is a class for representing colors and consists of red, green, blue, and alpha channel integer values in range of 0 to 255 including.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Color(int r, int g, int b)
    Creates an opaque color with given values.
    Color(int r, int g, int b, int a)
    Creates a color with given values.
